Broadlist Years Lists

2023 Nebula Award for Best Novel

In the Nebula Award for Best Novel list selected 6 books.

Broadlist has categorized these selections as:

  • Shortlist (6 books)
  • Winners (1 books)

Read more about how Broadlist categorizes lists.

Source: 2023 Nebula Award for Best Novel

Short List

  • Shigidi and the Brass Head of Obalufon by Wole Talabi

  • The Saint of Bright Doors by Vajra Chandrasekera Buy on Bookshop →
  • The Terraformers by Annalee Newitz

  • The Water Outlaws by S. L. Huang

  • Translation State by Ann Leckie

  • Witch King by Martha Wells

Winners

  • The Saint of Bright Doors by Vajra Chandrasekera
